parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: LastMaxId
parameters.description: The maximum asset ID of the most recent query.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: **500**. Default value: **500**. This value indicates that 500 entries are displayed on each page.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request. You do not need to specify this parameter. It is automatically obtained by the system.

parameters.name: StrategyId
parameters.description:
The ID of the policy.

>  You can call the [DescribeWhiteListStrategyList](~~DescribeWhiteListStrategyList~~) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The policy type of the asset that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **1**: learning policy
*   **2**: application policy
